response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and preferences. Given its value to you, I believe it would greatly enhance your daily operations or personal satisfaction. We are confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer aims to provide a fair balance between compensating us adequately for the product's value and ensuring you receive a competitive deal. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 9500}
